titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 1667) to authorize atmospheric and satellite programs and functions of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-429.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 269 - 139 (Record Vote No: 445).

bill.summary: 11/10/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 1667 (National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration funding).
